## InternalServerErrorRenderer.show() method

Displays pure response for internal server error 5xx error codes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
show(errorInfo: InternalServerErrorInfo, deleteCallback: (errorInfo: InternalServerErrorInfo) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  errorInfo | [InternalServerErrorInfo](./error-handling.internalservererrorinfo.md) | Error info to be displayed |
|  deleteCallback | (errorInfo: [InternalServerErrorInfo](./error-handling.internalservererrorinfo.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Callback called when displayed error request removal of error |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
